description.author: John Lenz <lenz@math.uic.edu>
description.synopsis: A web interface to the notmuch email indexer
description.description:
An email client for the notmuch email indexer (<http://notmuchmail.org>),
built using Yesod.  This project implements a web server and uses bootstrap
and jquery for the UI.  The client is fully functional, with searching, viewing,
and composing email messages.  See
<https://bitbucket.org/wuzzeb/notmuch-web/src/tip/ChangeLog> for recent changes.

package-flags.name: dev
package-flags.description: Turn on development settings, like auto-reload templates.
